TitleEnglish: Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft
SummaryEnglish: Thrust into a high-stakes chase around the world, fearless adventurer Lara Croft confronts her traumatic past while unraveling an ancient mystery.

1.SummaryEnglish: Lara Croft deve tornare a casa quando un pericoloso e potente manufatto cinese viene rubato da Croft Manor da un ladro con uno strano legame personale. La sua audace ricerca la porterà in un'avventura in giro per il mondo e nelle profondità di tombe dimenticate, dove sarà costretta a confrontarsi con il suo vero sé e decidere che tipo di eroe vuole diventare.
When a high-tech thief steals a mysterious jade artifact from Croft Manor, fearless archeological adventurer Lara Croft leaps into action to retrieve it.

2.TitleEnglish: A Set of Lies Agreed Upon
2.SummaryEnglish: Tracking the thief to a village in China, Lara and Jonah search for a group of missing children and make a remarkable discovery in an underground tomb.

3.SummaryEnglish: Vengeful mercenary Devereaux reveals the truth behind his hunt for the peril stones. Lara infiltrates the compound of a notorious warlord in Istanbul.

4.SummaryEnglish: Deep in the Paris catacombs, Lara and Interpol agent Camilla Roth uncover a mythical link between the peril stones and the Knights Templar.

5.SummaryEnglish: After skydiving into Iran, Lara boards a speeding train and fights the possessed passengers to rescue an old friend from Devereaux's sinister control.

6.SummaryEnglish: An astrological clue sends Lara racing to the site of an ancient battle, where legend says the final peril stone resides beneath a golden tree.

7.SummaryEnglish: With time running out, Lara and Camilla lead a desperate mission to separate the peril stones from Devereaux — whose body undergoes a monstrous change.

8.TitleEnglish: A Journey of a Thousand Miles
8.SummaryEnglish: High atop the mystical Kunlun Mountain, Lara faces the challenges of a goddess — and a colossal new threat — in her quest to restore order to the world.
